definitions.definition: Designed to resemble a handwriting style developed in Italy in the 16th century.
definitions.label_groups: typography , of a typeface or font

definitions.definition: Having letters that slant or lean to the right; oblique .
examples: The text was impossible to read: every other word was underlined or in a bold or italic font.
definitions.label_groups: typography , of a typeface or font

main_definition: ( typography , of a typeface or font ) Designed to resemble a handwriting style developed in Italy in the 16th century.
secondary_definitions: ( typography , of a typeface or font ) Having letters that slant or lean to the right; oblique .
